document_data.caption: A map showing Spices Street in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Spices Street
document_data.starts: The [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Spices Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Spices Street was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. It originated on the western side of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], branching west the turning southwest near its midpoint to end on [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]] on the waterfront. Other roads connecting with Spices Street included [[Wharf Street]] and [[Fishgut Alley]].
